column1: back of a length, 128kph, outside off, he defends off the back foot to point
bang! launches this flat over mid on! Length ball on off, he just stands delivers slapping this over mid on, and a couple of bounces over the rope
back of a length outside off, he opens the face and glides this easily to third man
full on the pads, he flicks this superbly in the air towards deep square but it doesn't carry to the man on the rope
checked lofted cover drive nearly goes for six! He leans back to a fuller ball wide of off, and lifts this up and over cover-point and it lands inches inside the rope

overthrows! He just nudged this behind point, called yes but it wasn't there and was sent back, Maddinson fires at the striker's stumps, misses and no one is able to back it up, it runs away for two runs
120kph, good length outswinger, he's standing tall and defending with the full face
he walks at Stoinis, tries to whip a length ball, gets a thick inside edge onto pad and rolling to midwicket, he looks for one but it's not on, Dunk fields well and fires but Finch gets back
shorter length, 113kph, slower ball, angling down leg, he misses out trying to work behind square but it rolls off the pad for a leg bye
123kph, good length but wide and he is back and gliding this beautifully between short third man and backward point! Superb placement and timing!
127kph, good length on off, he drives on the up, pinging this straight to cover
111kph, slower ball off cutter, he tries to cut to point
Launched down the ground! He backed away, gave room to free the arms and lofted this high to the sightscreen! Great strike
clips this over midwicket from off stump for six! Fuller on off and he whipped this high over the leg side! Incredible timing
full on the pads, he works this away through square leg
slower ball, back of a length, he opens the face and gets an edge but it drops just short of the keeper

caught at mid on! A screamer from Bravo! Length ball on middle, he lofts over mid on, doesn't nail it, Bravo takes a couple of steps back on the circle, jumps up with the right hand and reels in a superb catch! He timed his jump beautifully! He had to jump high and it stuck in the right hand.
135kph, good length wide of off, he defends off the back foot to backward point
shorter length wide of off, he tries to cut but chops it off the bottom edge into the pitch

caught at deep point by Maddinson! Another incredible catch! Finch advances to a length ball outside off, he slices a lofted drive high towards point, Maddinson is on the rope at deep cover-point, he had to run a long way to his left and got there with two hands and held it brilliantly rolling to the turf!
132kph, good length, on middle and leg, he backs away and slaps a drive to cover

bowled him! Poor shot! Good length off cutter on middle and leg, he backs away and swings wildly trying to swipe this over the leg side, it beats the inside of the bat and crashes into middle and leg three-quarters of the way up!
133kph, back of a length on off, he defends from the crease to mid on
fuller on off, he drives but doesn't time it to mid off
123kph good length on off, he's back and working this with nice timing to mid on
116kph, slower ball, off cutter, he's back and across whipping this to fine leg
White is on the walk, Stoinis digs in a 124kph length ball, White defends to mid on
nearly a run out! Fuller slower ball, 107kph, he pushes on the front foot to mid on, Maxwell swoops as they pinch one, Maxwell fires at the striker's and missed but Cooper would have been just short
slower ball on middle and leg, tucks this through square leg

Bowled him! Slower ball shoots low! He bowled a slower ball off cutter, digging it in back of a length, he tried a cross bat pull shot, he expected more bounce, it stayed a touch low, shot under the bat and hit the top of off!
120kph angled into leg stump, he clips this easily through midwicket to the sweeper
125kph, good length outside off, he defends with soft hands to backward point
126kph, off cutter on off, he defends from the crease to cover
121kph, slower ball on middle, he whips this through square leg to the sweeper
123kph, shorter length on the hip, he swivels and pulls this fine of wide fine leg and it runs away to the rope!
shorter length on off, he's back and across and defending with the full face
full toss outside off, he drives to long off along the ground
leg break outside off, he pushes on the front foot through cover-point to the sweeper
full toss outside off, he paddle sweeps around the corner for a single
faster leg break, 88kph, pushed through on off, he's back and defending
87kph, flatter on off, full, he works against the turn to the gap at midwicket
tossed up outside off, 92kph, he drives firmly back at the bowler and Zampa dives and makes a good save
122kph, back of a length on off, he's back and working this through forward square leg to the sweeper
125kph, length ball on off, he pushes off the back foot slowly towards long on, they push hard on the first run but there is no two on offer
128kph, full half-volley angled down leg, he glances nicely but straight to wide fine leg
127kph, good length angled into leg stump, he clips this off the pads to midwicket
128kph, back of a length outside off, he punches in the air off the back foot but splits the gap between cover and mid off! Great power and timing to pick the gap off the back foot
slower ball wider of off, he plays and misses trying to force square
tossed up wide of off, he reaches out and crunches a cover-drive, it's struck with such power the sweeper on the fence can't cut it off!
tossed up again, he drives very hard to cover, there's a misfield allowing one
shorter length, he punches off the back foot to a straight midwicket in place to save one
fuller outside off, he reaches out and paddle sweeps fine, nicely done by Nabi, the outfield slows it up and they get three
93kph, leg break outside off, he drives firmly to long off
90kph, loops up a leg break wide of off, he square drives neatly through point to the sweeper
leg break on off, not much turn, he defends on the front foot
tries to slog sweep, miscues in the air to long on, Bird is slow to come in and it just drops short! He might not have picked that up off the bat!
shorter down leg, he tucks this away fine for one
leg break outside off, but no turn, he drives straight to cover
73kph, slower wider leg break, he cuts but mistimes to point
full outside off, he reaches out and lap sweeps it to fine leg but only gets one
107kph, good length slower ball, off cutter, he chips this in the air towards long on but it drops short of the man coming in
back of a length on off, he tries to force off the back foot but drags it to midwicket
111kph, off cutter slower ball, back of a length, he punches off the back foot to midwicket
98kph slower ball full toss on leg, he clips this off the toe of the bat in the air but safely to the gap at square leg
126kph, good length wide of off, he's back and cutting to deep point
107kph, slower ball, back of a length, he gives himself room to cut but misses and it goes over middle stump
122kph, back of a length outside off, he punches off the back foot to long off
123kph, fuller outside off, he mistimes a drive off the inside edge onto pad into the off side
122kph, half-volley outside off, he drives firmly to long off
129kph. back of a length, nips away outside off, he opens the face to run to third man but it beats the edge
beaten again by a length slower ball wide of off. Again he's trying to glide to third man
123kph, fuller length outside off, he drives on the front foot to long on
120kph, slower ball, he backs away, doesn't pick it, checks the shot and chips it high in theair but it lands safely short of deep midwicket running in
122kph back of a length outside off, he tries to force off the back but mistimes to backward point
good length wide of off, he punches nicely off the back foot firmly through point this time

caught at deep backward square! A slower ball, fuller on leg, he flicks this in the air with the angle trying to clear the rope, didn't get all of it, Maddinson camps under it 5 metres in from the rope and takes the catch easily
123kph, slower ball outside off, back of a length, he's back and working this to long on
good length wide off, he punches on the front foot to deep cover-point
128kph good length on middle, he punches a drive to long on
half volley on leg stump, he clips this hard behind square, O'Connell works hard on the rope and cuts it off but it's still two
short and wide and he cuts hard through backward point! Well timed and placed to find the rope!
good length on off, 130kph, he stands tall and punches down to long on
back of a length on middle, he defends from the crease back to the bowler
133kph, fuller outside off, he drives firmly in the air towards long off but it bounces short of the man
leg break on middle, he skips out and drives down to long on
90kph shorter leg break he punches off the back foot to deep cover-point
tossed up and he steps out and drives brilliantly through cover, picks the gap superbly and it races away!
11kph, leg break, driven hard on the bounce back to Zampa who acrobatically knocks it down
wrong un, good length, 91kph, he doesn't quite pick it, but plays it off the pitch turning it to fine leg

caught at long on! Good catch by Gulbis. He tossed it up bravely, Nabi skips out and tries to launch over long on, hits it well but it's a huge boundary, Gulbis is back on the rope, jumps up and takes a good two-handed catch above his head
127kph, back of a length on middle and off, he turns this away with the angle to fine leg
121kph, good length outside off, he defends with an angled blade to backward point
117kph, slower ball cutter on off, he defends into the off side and they pinch one
120kph, short slower ball, he pulls but mistimes it to fine leg
119kph, slower ball, back of a length, he chops it off the inside and it nearly rolls back onto leg stump but it was far enough away not to cause any heart flutters
good length off stump, he's forced to defend, another dot ball
nearly a mix up! He glances to short fine, Wildermuth runs but Christian doesn't, but Bravo misfields as he looked up to see the mix up and they get one
full toss hit flat in the air towards long on but well short of him
lofts this inside out over long off! Incredible timing! He skipped out to the pitch and lofted it with a punch over long off and man on the rope just watches it sail over his head
fuller on middle, he pushes back to the bowler

caught and bowled! Well bowled Zampa. Top spinner, good length, he tries to knock it into the leg side but closes the face a touch and bunts a leading edge back to Zampa. He takes the catch rolling to his right! Christian yells at himself for the error
shorter outside off, he pushes off the back foot to cover
slower ball, 111kph, wide of off, he cuts this to backward point
128kph fuller length on off, he drives back to the bowler
125kph, bouncer, way too high and rightly called wide
132kph, fuller on off, he clips this hard through midwicket into the gap, Dunk has to work hard to his left to cut it off
133kph, good length outside off, he defends off a thick inside edge onto pad and rolls into the off side
loopy slower ball wide of off, he squeezes one out through point to the sweeper
134kph, full toss fired way down the leg side for wide
134kph, back of a length outside off, he tries to pull but it's not short enough, he misses
steps way outside off and launches this over midwicket into the stands! He moves early, it's a 99kph slower ball in the slot and he crunched it high and long over the fence
slower ball, better length, he pushes this down towards long on
caught at deep square! Length slower ball outside off, he tries to swing this over square leg like Boyce did, mistimes it, it carries all the way to Maddinson near the rope and he takes another catch
94kph, slower ball, again he steps outside off, swings hard but slaps it along the ground to deep midwicket
131kph, fuller outside off, he drives and gets a thick edge that flies away to third man through the vacant gully

caught at mid on! The man comes into the circle and he falls for the trap! It was a 91kph slower ball fuller length, he might have been expecting a short ball with the field change, he backs away and miscues a heave off the toe, hits it straight to the man at mid on and it's an easy catch
shorter length, he knocks this away to the circle at midwicket and they run brilliantly to get two
106kph, slower ball, full toss that dips late, he just spots it late and bunts this away to midwicket
Bowled him! 131kph inswinger! He was expecting the slower ball and he fired the faster inswinger, straight through the gate and flattened leg stump! Too good
tossed up, 83kph he backs away and drags a drive down to long on

Bowled him! He's done it again! Stunning piece of bowling! Slower off break, drifting into off from wide around the wicket, pitches off stump, grips and turns, beats the outside edge and hits the top of off! He wasn't expecting that much turn! Superb delivery
96kph, outswinger, wide of off, he late cuts to backward point
80kph, shorter off break, he's back and cutting hard to point on the circle
flighted higher outside off, he drives steering it past cover through the gap for a couple
95kph, outswinger, on off, he skips out and drives to long on
back of a length on off, 129kph, he whips this behind square, the sweeper has to work to his right, they get two
132kph, back of a length outside off, he steps back and across tries to whip to leg but misses
135kph, shorter length outside off, he runs this down to wide third man, Handscomb pushes for two, they nearly go but opt not to in the end
133kph, bouncer, well directed, he ducks underneath it
appeal for LBW but not out sliding leg side. 135kph, length ball, nipping in, caught on the crease, it hit above the knee roll. No DRS of course in the BBL
back of a length on off, he defends off the back foot
11kph, length angled into off, he's back and across, working this through square leg
123kph, shorter length on middle, he's back and turning this through square leg to the man in the deep
112kph, good length on middle and leg, he slips this through forward square leg to the sweeper
slower ball dragged down the leg side and called wide
123kph, good length angled down the leg side again
111kph shorter down leg, he pulls this around the corner to short fine leg
slower ball, length ball wide of off, he mistimes this to cover-point
111kph slower ball on leg, he punches off the back foot to long on
134kph, back of a length wide of off, he punches off the back foot to cover
134kph, back of a length on leg, he tries to pull, gets taken on the top of the pad, they appeal but it was going down
short ball outside off, he flat bats a pull shot powerfully over mid on! He didn't middle it but got enough of it
135kph, back of a length outside off, he pulls through midwicket for a couple
132kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and across and defending with soft hands close into the off side and they pinch a single

caught at cover! 117kph slower ball deceives him! Back of a length, held up in the pitch, he punches off the back foot in the air straight to cover and White takes the catch! Richardson celebrates like Stoinis does when he takes a wicket, the hulk flex directed at Stoinis!
131kph, fuller outside off, he drives firmly back to the bowler
132kph, good length wide of off, he lifts a drive up and over cover, he doesn't time it again but he gets enough of it to get two
126kph, shorter length on middle, he's back and turning this through square leg to the sweeper
shorter length on middle, he tucks this to square leg
134kph, fuller outside off, he pushes a drive, mistimes it to mid on but slowly enough to take one
hammers a cut shot through point! He hit this like a bullet! 132kph shorter and wider, he backed away and thrashed it. The fielders didn't move as it flew through the infield
135kph, good length outside off, he defends from the crease to cover
135kph, back of a length on off, he defends on the back foot back to the bowler
133kph back of a length on off, he is back and across and working this through midwicket to the sweeper
134kph, back of a length outside off, he pushes off the back foot to the gap at point
130kph good length on leg, he's back and turning this to the gap at midwicket
132kph bouncer, well directed, he tries to hook but misses
83kph, slider full and straight, he's back and punching this to long on
81kph, good length, he's back and working to the circle at wide mid on, Boyce races across to cut off two
80kph good length leg break on off, he defends on the front foot

Maxwell run out trying for two! Richardson got him with a perfect throw! Stoinis clips this powerfully through square leg to the gap in the deep, Richardson races around, they take on the throw with a second run, Richardson fires a rocket, right next to the bails at the bowler's end, Boyce barely has to move his hands to knock the bails off! He was well short
good length on off, he defends on the back foot
shorter and wider, he cuts hard to deep cover-point
128kph full outside off, he drives firmly back at the bowler, Wildermuth knocks it away and they get one
126kph good length outside off, he defends back to the bowler
125kph, shorter length outside off, he rides the bounce defending into the gully
back of a length on off, 128kph, he is caught on the crease defending back to the bowler
131kph, fuller on off, he pushes on the front foot down to long on
128kph back of a length on leg, he tucks this behind square with ease
129kph good length outside off, he drives on the up to mid off
129kph short and wide, he cracks a cut shot but nails it straight to deep cover-point
beats him, good length angled across the left-hander past the outside edge
124kph, short ball, he rolls the wrists on a pull shot behind square to the man in the deep
122kph, leg cutter on off, he tries to work it to midwicket but just knocks it down onto the pitch
114kph, slower ball, fuller outside off, he pushes on the front foot back to the bowler
86kph shorter length on off, he pulls straight to midwicket
short and wide and cut hard through point to the sweeper
81kph leg break on off, he gives room and cuts to point and runs despite the man making a rolling save
short drag down and he rocks back and heaves this way back over midwicket in the stands! Too short and Maddinson pounced

dropped by Finch cover! Really tough one. One hander to his left. it was punched in the air off the back foot, Finch dives left and sticks the left hand out but it just doesn't hit the middle of the palm. Tough chance
shorter length on off, he's back and working this to the gap at midwicket
short on middle, he's back and pulling around the corner, he timed this so well it beats the sweeper at fine leg! Amazing shot
shorter length outside off, he defends into the off side
slower ball outside off, he slaps this in the air down the ground straight of long on and calls two straight away
106kph, slower ball, he tries to cut but mistimes to cover
126kph, full outside off, and he hammers a drive powerfully down the ground straight of mid off! He just punched through it with the bottom hand!
126kph, almost yorker length, he thumps this back at the bowler who knocks it away but they get one
short and wide and cut beautifully behind backward point! 132kph but wide and he jumped all over it. Timing and placement was from the top drawer
115kph, slower ball on off, he pushes on the front foot to long on
131kph, back of a length outside off, he punches off the back foot to deep cover-point
132kph, back of a length outside off, he punches off the back foot to long off
116kph, good length on off, he steers this from the crease to point
119kph, good length on off, he's back and across working this to midwicket
shorter outside off, he pushes off the back foot to cover
drifting into leg, he clips this off the pads to deep square leg
84kph, off break outside off, he tries to turn to midwicket, gets a slight leading edge but short of the bowler
yorker length, he digs it out to midwicket
85kph, slower and drifting in, he gives himself room and drives powerfully inside out fot deep cover-point
93kph, shorter outside off, he's back and working this with the wrists down to long on
83kph, shorter length, he goes back to pull, it stops in the wicket, he checks his shot and chips it in the air to mid on but it lands safely as long on is back
fuller length outside off, he tries to cut but is beaten
81kph slower outside off, he tries to sweep and misses again
shorter length wide of off, 88kph, he's back and hammering this back at Boyce but he misfields allowing one
tossed up outside off, he just lifts this up and over cover with ease and it races to the rope! Superb skill to manipulate this with his hands up and over the fielder and times it well enough
fuller on leg, he just nudges this into the leg side. Another 50 for Stoinis in the BBL
102kph, slower ball wide of off, he reaches out and mistimes a drive to cover
slower ball length outside off, he's back and working this to midwicket
128kph, fuller outside off, he drives on the move back to the bowler
127kph, good length outside off, he walks down and whips this to wide long on
104kph, slower ball, good length wide off, he pushes a drive to cover
full and wide of off, he drives firmly to long off
pulled hard through the gap at midwicket! Just a fractionally short leg break and the power of Stoinis to pound this into the gap in the deep is unreal!
fuller outside off, he drives down to long off
84kph, tossed up outside off, he drives firmly down to long on
85kph shorter leg break, he's back and punching this hard back past the bowler, straight of long on for two
80kph tossed up outside off, he pushes a drive to wide long off
shorter on leg, he punches off the back foot to wide long on, they look at two but it's not there
135kph, good length on middle, he whips this to mid on but can't beat the man
back of a length, he stands up and drives to mid off on the circle and runs with the stroke
137kph fuller outside off, he turns this off the front foot through midwicket
136kph short ball, he mistimes a pull, it hangs in the air forever behind square but falls short of the man running in!
137kph fuller outside off, he drives to long on for a single

caught at deep square leg! Bounced him out this time! Another short one but a little higher and wider, he pulls hard, gets a good piece of it but not enough to clear the rope at square leg, Harris waits under it and takes the catch! Another twist
102kph length slower ball outside off, he cuts hard to deep cover-point
100kph length slower ball on the top of leg, he's back and across and tucks it behind square
125kph, fired way down the leg side and called wide
100kph short slower ball wide of off, he cuts nicely fine of backward point but White makes a good diving save to cut it to one
120kph, good length on off, he defends to cover who is in tight
quicker ball fired into leg stump, hits him on pads, but outside the line of leg, a dot ball
103kph, length slower ball wide of off, he mistimes a cut to point and they are happy to give him one
edged down fine of third man! Shorter slower ball wide of off, he backs away and slashes, gets an edge off the toe of the bat, third man is inside the circle, it races fine of him for four!
114kph, length on off, he backs away and smokes this off the back foot straight to the cover fielder
lofts this over cover for six! Staggering shot! Full outside off, in trademark style he leans back and flicks the hands through it lofting this over cover and it goes all the way!
full on leg, he drives this to long on for a single
short and wide and cit hard past point for four! A bad ball, 110kph slower ball but short and wide, Stoinis cracked it through the gap at point
low full toss he whips this behind square to wide fine leg
106kph shorter slower ball, he's back and across and flicking this through forward square to the sweeper
low full toss he backs away and lofts this over cover! That will do it!
